ygData.subject: Re: Whats a good way to get started into tinkering?
ygData.msgSnippet: Your best bet is to wait until they actually make it worth it.  As it stands, with the default charisma gnomes have, buying the least expensive possible items
ygData.messageBody:
Your best bet is to wait until they actually make it
worth it. As it stands, with the default charisma
gnomes have, buying the least expensive possible items
(even having your friends give you pie tins and
skewers), you don't make profit off the most simple
items (compasses). It gets worse as you go up in
complexity, and the majority of the components are not
even in the game (it seems to me from all the info I
have seen).

Wait until they improve it.

--- Billy Joe Bob Randy <ug_mug@...> wrote:
> From: Billy Joe Bob Randy <ug_mug@...>
>
> Whats a good way to get into tinkering? i just got
> 16th level and im
> going to start tinkering. What should i make first
> and how should i
> progress?
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor
> ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to like-minds and kindred
> spirits.
>
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------
